long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SFMC IntelliType: The Ultimate Extension for Salesforce Marketing Cloud

If you’re working in Salesforce Marketing Cloud—whether as a marketer personalizing content, a developer coding AMPscript, SSJS/SQL, or an admin managing complex automations—SFMC IntelliType is the browser extension you need. It’s designed to streamline your workflow, reduce errors, and help you build impactful campaigns faster.

What SFMC IntelliType Does:

* Search Data Extensions: Quickly search for DEs directly within the same tab and open them in a new tab instantly—no API calls or extra setup required.
* Intelligent Code Suggestions: Boost your coding speed and accuracy with autocomplete support for AMPscript, SSJS, and personalization tokens.
* Personalization Made Easy: Reference subscriber attributes and Data Extensions effortlessly without switching tabs.
* Error Reduction: Minimize typos and syntax errors with real-time hints and inline documentation.
Why You Should Install This Extension:

* Save Time & Effort: Spend less time searching for Data Extensions or memorizing syntax, and more time focusing on high-impact tasks.
* Boost Campaign Quality: Get immediate feedback on coding errors and best practices to avoid common mistakes.
* Elevate Collaboration: Ensure your team works with consistently structured code for smoother reviews and collaboration.
* All-in-One Convenience: Say goodbye to juggling multiple tabs, external documentation, or VScode. This extension brings everything you need into one place.


Install SFMC IntelliType today from the Chrome Web Store and supercharge your Salesforce Marketing Cloud workflow with this must-have extension!
